titleInfo.title: Crane on the Cumberland River, Nashville, Tennessee, 1956

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: A view of a hoisting crane along the Cumberland River, in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1956. These photos relate to railroad freight cars of the Tennessee Central Railroad Company, located near the warehouse storage facility. Another method of freight and merchandise transportation was via the Cumberland River on barges. Forms part of Nashville Banner Negatives Collection. 1 photographic negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
mods.accessCondition: U.S. and international copyright laws protect this digital content, which is provided for educational purposes only and may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed for any other purpose without written permission. Please contact: Metro Nashville Archives, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219. Telephone (615) 862-5880.
